Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo

Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionFSM
    The FSM for the interaction with the user to select the action on board
    AskCardMenu
    Menu to choose all cards for the game
    AskGodMenu
    Menu to choose the own god
    AskIpAndPortMenu
    Menu to read server's IP and port
    AskNameMenu
    Menu to ask and read the name of the player
    AskNumPlayersMenu
    Menu to ask and get the number of player of the game
    AskRestoreMenu
    Menu to choose if restore an existed game
    Board
    The main class of GUI.
    Building
    A single 3D piece of GUI
    DisconnectionMenu
    Menu to show the disconnection
    EndOfTurnMenu
    Menu to voluntary end the turn
    ErrorVisualizer
    It is an error visualizer with an animated string that tends to disappear
    GraphicsLoader
    It is a Loader of all graphics elements of GUI.
    Group3D
    It is an extends of javafx Group that makes the 3D group ratable and zoomable
    LoseMenu
    Menu of lose
    Menu
    It is a super class for all menu.
    PlayersMenu
    Menu to show the names and gods of players in game and reports who is the current player
    SelectPieceMenu
    Menu to chose the piece of a build move
    SelectTypeActionMenu
    Menu to chose the type of action
    Tower
    It is the collection of building in the 3D
    WinMenu
    Menu of win
    Worker
    A single 3D worker of GUI
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActionFSM.ActionState
    The enumeration of states of an action to display on the GUI.
